channel.title: SOC Goulash
channel.description:
Named after a colleague misheard me talking about SocGholish, presumably thinking I'd made some SOC-specific stew recipe. It was hilarious - you had to be there.
What this really is, is Threat Intelligence for the Defenders - SOC, Vulnerability Governance, Incident Response and Threat Intel.
This podcast and its sister newsletter aims to provide a tailored snapshot of the threats and tradecraft you need to be across to enable your day-to-day.
No marketing, no fluff - let's talk shop.
channel.author: Opalsec
channel.itunes:author: Opalsec
channel.itunes:summary:
Named after a colleague misheard me talking about SocGholish, presumably thinking I'd made some SOC-specific stew recipe. It was hilarious - you had to be there.
What this really is, is Threat Intelligence for the Defenders - SOC, Vulnerability Governance, Incident Response and Threat Intel.
This podcast and its sister newsletter aims to provide a tailored snapshot of the threats and tradecraft you need to be across to enable your day-to-day.
No marketing, no fluff - let's talk shop.

item.title: Daily News Update: Tuesday, September 12, 2025
item.description: Join us on SOC Goulash as we unpick the latest in cyber security, from the surge in Akira ransomware and critical zero-days in Android and AI tools, to the alarming release of a notorious healthcare hacker. We delve into cutting-edge threat intelligence, discuss how misconfigurations and insider risks continue to bite, and even uncover a quirky IoT jailbreak. Tune in for essential insights tailored for cyber security analysts, keeping you across the evolving threat landscape.
